participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and stylish; enjoys the finer things in life.
participant_1.background: my family does not support my career choices. i like shopping. i often shop for shoes and watches. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i currently work for a watch dealer.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Hardworking and down-to-earth; has a passion for nature and animals.
participant_2.background: i have three arabian horses. i help tend the fields. my father is a farmer. i like to ride horses. i like to listen to rock music while working.
